title: God Of Thunder (btab)
lyrics:
This was a cool little piece that Jason played before the intro to
 For Whom the Bell Tolls.  This was actually the guitar riff for the
 song, but here James and Kirk only played a scratch fill.
 
 tune all guitars down 1/2 step
 Gb-------------------------------------------------------
 Db---------------------------5--------------5---5-7-8-7-5
 Ab------7---5-7------7---5-7--------7---5-7---7----------
 Eb--0-0---7------0-0---7--------0-0---7------------------
